property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player may take any number of cards from his hand and exchange them with an equal number of resources attached to a single domain he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player sacrifices all of his characters committed to this story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player may choose a non-unique character he controls and search his deck for any number of cards with the same title. Put those cards into play. Then each player shuffles his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Return all characters committed to this story to their owners' hands.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you replace this story, rearrange any revealed stories, leaving all success tokens on the board in place.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player names a card type. The player to his left must then choose a card of that type he controls and return it to hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player must shuffle his hand into his deck and then draw the same number of cards. Then the player who won this story draws 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose 1 domain you control. Take all resource attached to it and place them into your hand. Replace those resource with and equal number of cards off the top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player choose one story card that he has won (except this one) and shuffles it into the story deck. Then, shuffle all RELIC cards in play into their owners' decks.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you replace this story, take all success tokens for each player and redistribute them between the revealed stories. No more than 4 success tokens can be assigned to any story on either player's side.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player may search his deck for a support card, reveal it, and put that card into his hand. Then each player shuffles his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search the story deck and choose 1 story card. Resolve that story's effect and then place into your won pile. Then shuffle The Seventh Gate into the story deck.

property.value: Relentless in Pursuit

property.value: Response: After an opponent places a success token on a story where you have 1 or more committed characters, discard that success token.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent destroys a character due to a # struggle at a story where Kau'uli Warriors is committed, search your deck for a card named Kau'uli Warriors. Then shuffle your deck and put Kau'uli Warriors on top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When Wooden Homunculus would be destroyed, instead place it face down as a new domain and attach the top card of your deck to it as a resource.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Symbol of Power

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Attachment. Relic. Mask.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. While attached character is committed to a story during your turn, you decide the order of struggles resolve at that story. After Mask of Rakinui leaves play, shuffle it into it's owner's deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character is destroyed, refresh a domain.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Blood Mage

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Subtypes
property.value: Lodge. Sorcerer.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: When you control more SORCERER characters than any opponent, sacrifice a SORCERER character to put a success token on a story. Limit once per round.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Order of the Silver Twilight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a non-ANCIENT ONE character committed to a story. All characters you control committed to that same story gain the icons of the sacrificed character until the end of the phase.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: He Sees What Is Not There

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay X to look at the top X cards of an opponent's deck. Return those cards to the top of that deck in any order.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Syndicate

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a MONSTER or CREATURE character is destroyed, draw 1 card.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Syndicate

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: All characters with skill X or lower do not count their printed icons until the end of the phase.

property.name: Descriptor
property.value: Playing All Sides

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If The Betrayer is able to commit to a story, he must commit to a story. Response: After The Betrayer is committed to a story, ready him to have each player reveal the top card of his deck. Then you choose whether each player discards that card or returns it to the top of his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a player. That player reveals the top X cards of his deck. Choose any number of cards revealed and place them on the bottom of that player's deck. Return the rest of the cards to the top deck in any order.
